business_profile.onboarding_process_description: 1. Complete an application 2. Sign your enrollment agreement 3. Finalise your tuition payment
business_profile.implementation_timelines: 2 weeks for AI Essentials for Office Professionals
support_channels: 24/7 support available with Zaio AI tutor and expert tutors
Free call with an Enrollment Consultant

faqs.question: Are there any exams or tests in the bootcamp?
faqs.answer: There are no exams or tests, however the bootcamp is project based and will require you to complete certain tasks.

faqs.question: Can I access the course materials after the bootcamp ends?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will have lifetime access to the course materials, and you can revisit them at any time. You also get 6 months of access to the platform after the course ends.

faqs.question: Can I study while working full-time?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our flexible learning options, including live classes held at different times and recorded sessions, allow you to study while balancing a full-time job or other commitments.

faqs.question: Do I need any prior coding or tech experience to join a bootcamp?
faqs.answer: No, our bootcamps are designed for beginners! We teach you everything from the ground up, ensuring you develop the skills you need to succeed, even if you're new to tech.

faqs.question: Do you offer job placement assistance after completing the bootcamp?
faqs.answer: While we do not provide placement support for Micro bootcamps, we provide networking opportunities, career support, and access to a vibrant community that can help with job referrals and opportunities.

faqs.question: How can I apply for a bootcamp?
faqs.answer: You can apply directly on our website. Visit the bootcamp landing page, choose the course you're interested in, and submit your application before the deadline.

faqs.question: How do the live classes work?
faqs.answer: We offer live classes twice a week—once in the morning and once in the evening, so you can choose the time that suits you. If you miss a session, don’t worry—recordings are available for you to catch up at your convenience.

faqs.question: How flexible are the payment options?
faqs.answer: We offer multiple payment options to fit your budget. You can pay upfront, in installments, or finance your education through partners like Manati and Capitec. This allows you to focus on learning while paying over time.

faqs.question: How is the bootcamp delivered?
faqs.answer: All bootcamps are delivered online and live, with recorded sessions available for later viewing. You will also have access to one-on-one support from Zaio AI tutors and expert instructors.

faqs.question: How long do the Micro bootcamps last?
faqs.answer: Each bootcamp lasts for 4 weeks, except for the AI Essentials for Office Professionals course, which runs for just 1 week.

faqs.question: How long will I have access to the recorded material once the bootcamp ends?
faqs.answer: Yes you will have access to all material for the next 12 months.

faqs.question: I have never coded before, will I cope?
faqs.answer: Our philosophy is that anyone can code as long as you are able to decide to wear something warm on a cold day. You do not require any previous coding experience as the course is tailored to students with varying degrees of experience.

faqs.question: What are the payment options available?
faqs.answer: Upfront Payment: Pay the full amount at the start of the course. 2 Installments: Pay over 2 installments. Financing: You can finance up to 100% of your bootcamp tuition through our funding partnerships.

faqs.question: What are the prerequisites for the courses?
faqs.answer: Web Development Fundamentals: No prior experience required. Backend Development with Node.js: Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required. Frontend Development with React.js: Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required. Programming Fundamentals with Python: No prerequisites. AI Essentials for Office Professionals: No prerequisites.

faqs.question: What career outcomes can I expect after completing the bootcamp?
faqs.answer: Zaio graduates have gone on to secure roles as web developers, data scientists, and junior software engineers. Our job placement support helps you land interviews, and our alumni network provides additional support as you navigate your job search.

faqs.question: What certification will I receive after completing a bootcamp?
faqs.answer: Upon successful completion, you will receive an NQF Level 5 certificate for the respective Micro bootcamp. This certificate can be added to your professional portfolio or LinkedIn profile.

faqs.question: What happens if I fail the interview and do not get the job?
faqs.answer: Due to the competitive nature of hiring for roles, we do not guarantee that you will be placed in a role, as there are many mitigating circumstances. What we will do is provide you with the support and skills to be best prepared for the interview.

faqs.question: What happens if I fall behind in the course?
faqs.answer: Don’t worry! Our 24/7 tutor support is here to help. You can reach out any time for assistance, and we’ll work with you to ensure you stay on track. Plus, you can catch up by watching recorded class sessions.

faqs.question: What happens if I need support?
faqs.answer: We believe the best method of support is community based, once you start the bootcamp, you will be enrolled in our discord community channel where you will gain direct access to the tutors and your fellow classmates. You will be able to interact and ask questions with real time answers.

faqs.question: What happens should I fail any of the assignments or fail the bootcamp? Will I have to do another bootcamp?
faqs.answer: We will provide you with feedback throughout the bootcamp and you will have the opportunity to book one on one sessions with the head tutor should you feel you are struggling and falling behind. We will provide you with all the tools necessary to ensure you are set up for success.

faqs.question: What if I miss a live session?
faqs.answer: All live sessions are recorded and can be accessed at any time during and after the course. Additionally, you will have access to one-on-one support with instructors and AI tutors.

faqs.question: What is a Zaio Micro Bootcamp?
faqs.answer: A Zaio Micro Bootcamp is a fast-paced, online course designed to teach you a specific set of skills in web development, programming, and AI essentials. These bootcamps are suitable for beginners and last between 1 to 4 weeks.

faqs.question: What is included in the bootcamp?
faqs.answer: 2 weekly live sessions (recorded for later access), One-on-one support with tutors, Lifetime access to a vibrant community for networking and job opportunities, 6 months access to the platform after the course ends.

faqs.question: What is the cost of the micro bootcamps?
faqs.answer: Web Development Fundamentals: R10,000. Backend Development with Node.js: Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required. Frontend Development with React.js: Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required. Programming Fundamentals with Python: R10,000. AI Essentials for Office Professionals: R10,000.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the Bootcamp?
faqs.answer: The bootcamp runs over period of 6 months, broken down into weekly and daily tasks for you to complete.

faqs.question: What is the price of the bootcamp and are there any payment plans?
faqs.answer: The fees are R25,500 and we have 3 payment options- Upfront payment (full payment of R25,500), 2 part payment plan (R13,000 + R13,000), Financing through our third party called Manati student funding

faqs.question: What kind of job support does Zaio offer?
faqs.answer: We offer guaranteed job placement assistance. This includes resume building, interview coaching, mock interviews, and direct connections to hiring partners to help you secure your first tech job.

faqs.question: Who can I chat with if I have additional questions?
faqs.answer: We have a team of dedicated expert consultants both pre and post enrolment. Should you have any questions to assist in your decision making process, contact any of the consultants. Additionally, You will receive continuous support from our tutor team during the Micro Bootcamp to ensure You are successful in your journey.

faqs.question: Who can join a Zaio Micro Bootcamp?
faqs.answer: Our bootcamps are designed for individuals with little to no prior experience in coding or technology. Each Micro bootcamp has specific requirements (e.g., basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) or is open to complete beginners.

faqs.question: Will I receive a certificate at the end of the bootcamp?
faqs.answer: Yes you will receive a certificate which is recognized internationally, additionally, you will be invited to attend a virtual graduation ceremony.

business_profile.aggregated_company_summary: Zaio is an online education provider offering accredited, remote bootcamps and micro bootcamps in tech fields like Full Stack Web Development, Data Science, Cybersecurity, and AI Essentials. Their programs are designed to fast-track careers with job-ready skills, catering to both individuals and corporate partners through flexible, scalable, and personalized training. With no prior experience required, Zaio focuses on bridging the IT skills gap and providing job placement support.
